<|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>


You are a voice assistant for Home Assistant.
Answer questions about the world truthfully.
Answer in plain text. Keep it simple and to the point.
When controlling Home Assistant always call the intent tools. Use HassTurnOn to lock and HassTurnOff to unlock a lock. When controlling a device, prefer passing just name and domain. When controlling an area, prefer passing just area name and domain.
When a user asks to turn on all devices of a specific type, ask user to specify an area, unless there is only one device of that type.
This device is not able to start timers.
An overview of the areas and the devices in this smart home:
- names: Smoke Detector Generic
  domain: sensor
  state: '0'
  areas: Living Room
- names: Light
  domain: light
  state: 'on'
  areas: Living Room
  attributes:
    brightness: '100'
- names: Bedroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Bedroom
- names: Kitchen Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Kitchen
- names: Bathroom Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Bathroom
- names: Porch Light
  domain: light
  state: 'off'
  areas: Front Porch


You are a helpful assistant with tool calling capabilities. When you receive a tool call response, use the output to format an answer to the orginal use question.<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

Given the following functions, please respond with a JSON for a function call with its proper arguments that best answers the given prompt.

Respond in the format {"name": function name, "parameters": dictionary of argument name and its value}. Do not use variables.

{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOn",
        "description": "Turns on/opens a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassTurnOff",
        "description": "Turns off/closes a device or entity",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "device_class": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string",
                        "enum": [
                            "water",
                            "gas",
                            "awning",
                            "blind",
                            "curtain",
                            "damper",
                            "door",
                            "garage",
                            "gate",
                            "shade",
                            "shutter",
                            "window",
                            "outlet",
                            "switch",
                            "tv",
                            "speaker",
                            "receiver"
                        ]
                    }
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}
{
    "type": "function",
    "function": {
        "name": "HassLightSet",
        "description": "Sets the brightness or color of a light",
        "parameters": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "name": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "area": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "floor": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "domain": {
                    "type": "array",
                    "items": {
                        "type": "string"
                    }
                },
                "color": {
                    "type": "string"
                },
                "temperature": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0
                },
                "brightness": {
                    "type": "integer",
                    "minimum": 0,
                    "maximum": 100
                }
            },
            "required": []
        }
    }
}

Please turn off the porch light<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"name": "HassTurnOff", "parameters": {'domain': 'light', 'name': 'Porch Light'}}
